pages.text: The Discord server of the modpack is available for general discussion,$(br)finding servers, modpack news, and more.$(br2)Please make sure to not go there for support as it is not recommended. Go to$(br)the $(l:getting_support)issue tracker$() instead.
In order to get to the Discord Server of the modpack, please click the link bellow.$(br2)Please make sure you are registered to Discord in order to join the server.$(br2) $(br2)           ⇩ ⇩ ⇩
